page.title: 07DOMETIC HEATING, PETWORTH NE
page.content: All property in this area, old or new, has electricity.Gownfold Farm and some of the new Hawkhurst Court houses have Calor Gas tanks, and Bulchin's has a Calor Gas Aga for cooking.Many of the private houses have oil central heating. At Shipbourne cottage, Marshall's farmhouse and Lowfold, cooking is by oil Agas, but Gownfold and Buckfold farms have solid fuel Raeburn stoves. For heating, open wood fires have become popular, part of the 1980's nostalgia for past comforts as a reaction against the bleak clinical efficiency of electric fires. Buckfold Farm has an enclosed free-standing wood-burning stove in the sitting room that stays alight all night. For this fire the farmer buys a standing tree from the estate woodman, felling it and logging it himself. Drainage is either by septic tank or cesspool.
